name: Starlight (itch) (Kyjmo)
description:
A short story game made in 2 weeks as part of a personal game jam challenge.

Catch stars to give to the residents of this small planet consumed by darkness. With no star, all is dark.. but you can change that...

(3 residents total to help)

Controls :

Move- WSAD

Talk- E 

Catch- Space

Its a bit wonky and disorienting at times but I hope you have fun regardless! 

Credits: 

Game by Kyjmo

Concepts & Character design by Marimooo

Some sounds by LYFE4M 

Also shoutout to my lovely partner who encouraged me to finish this game before starting the next! :3
